meanings.sent1: The children yaffle with joy at the funny clown.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but yaffle when her friend told a hilarious joke.
meanings.sent3: The yaffling from the comedy show echoed through the theater.
meanings.sent4: His infectious yaffling filled the room with happiness.
meanings.sent5: The sound of her yaffling could be heard from miles away.

meanings.sent1: His yaffle could be heard across the entire party.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's yaffle was so contagious that everyone joined in.
meanings.sent3: The yaffle of the hyenas in the zoo made the visitors chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her yaffle was like music to his ears, bringing a smile to his face.
meanings.sent5: The yaffle of the audience filled the theater with mirth and cheer.

meanings.sent1: The yaffle of the car engine signaled trouble ahead.
meanings.sent2: The yaffle of the thunderstorm kept everyone indoors.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected yaffle of the alarm clock startled him awake.
meanings.sent4: The yaffle of the fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The yaffle of the crowd at the concert added to the excitement of the event.
